item.title: Drop me a line!
item.description: Feel free to reach out to me through any of the following methods: Email You can email me at amaad.michael@gmail.com. Social Media LinkedIn: A. Michael Tatum GitHub: amaad-michael Newsletter SubStack: PAYLOAD;; Michael Tatum’s Linux Newsletter Location I am based in the Austin, TX metro area.

item.title: Greetings!
item.description: I am a Linux and cybersecurity engineer based in the Austin metro area. I manage servers from both the Debian and RHEL families of distributions. I audit security with Kali and BlackArch. I focus on cloud platforms, automation, and infrastructure-as-code. I write technical papers and documentation. I administer varied systems at scale with Ansible and SaltStack. I assemble powerful and efficient hardware builds. Consider joining me on my free newsletter.
